meanings.definition: The act of singing or reciting in a monotonous, repetitive way.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the chanting of prayers filled the air.
meanings.sent2: The monks began their chanting as part of their daily ritual.
meanings.sent3: The chanting of the nursery rhyme made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The chanting of the waves against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: The haunting chanting echoed through the ancient temple.

meanings.definition: A series of words or sounds repeated in a rhythmic manner.
meanings.sent1: The football fans started a chanting cheer to support their team.
meanings.sent2: The rhythmic chanting of the mantra helped her relax.
meanings.sent3: The chanting of the birds in the morning was like a natural alarm clock.
meanings.sent4: The chanting of the cicadas created a symphony in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive chanting of the slogan energized the crowd.
